description.zh-cn: 中国精神科医生，因其在临沂市第四人民医院网络成瘾戒治中心使用电击等强制手段治疗所谓的“网瘾”患者而广受争议。被媒体和网民称为“全国戒网瘾专家”。
description.en: A controversial Chinese psychiatrist known for using electroshock therapy and other coercive methods to treat so-called 'internet addicts' at the Internet Addiction Treatment Center of Linyi Fourth People's Hospital. He is referred to as a 'national expert on quitting internet addiction' by media and netizens.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省临沂市的一家医院，杨永信在此担任副院长，并设立了网络成瘾戒治中心。
description.en: A hospital located in Linyi, Shandong, China, where Yang Yongxin served as vice president and established the Internet Addiction Treatment Center.

nodes.id: 杨永信网络成瘾戒治中心

zh-cn: 杨永信网络成瘾戒治中心
en: Yang Yongxin Internet Addiction Treatment Center

description.zh-cn: 由杨永信在临沂市第四人民医院内设立并主管的机构，专门收治被认为是网络成瘾的青少年，因使用电击疗法而备受争议。
description.en: An institution established and directed by Yang Yongxin within the Linyi Fourth People's Hospital, specializing in treating adolescents considered to have internet addiction. It is highly controversial for its use of electroshock therapy.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，杨永信是其党员。
description.en: The ruling political party of China, of which Yang Yongxin is a member.

nodes.id: 山东省沂水医学专科学校

zh-cn: 山东省沂水医学专科学校

description.zh-cn: 杨永信于1982年7月毕业的专科学校，主修临床医学。
description.en: The junior college from which Yang Yongxin graduated in July 1982, majoring in clinical medicine.

description.zh-cn: 杨永信获得本科学历和学士学位的医学院校。
description.en: The medical university where Yang Yongxin obtained his bachelor's degree.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省下辖的地级市，是杨永信的出生地和主要工作地点。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Shandong Province, China. It is Yang Yongxin's birthplace and primary place of work.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省的卫生行政部门，曾在2008年授予杨永信荣誉称号。
description.en: The health administration department of Shandong Province, China, which awarded Yang Yongxin an honorary title in 2008.

nodes.id: 中国中央电视台社会与法频道

zh-cn: 中国中央电视台社会与法频道

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台旗下的一个频道，其节目《第一线》曾播出赞扬杨永信的纪录片《战网魔》。
description.en: A channel under China Central Television, whose program 'The Front Line' aired the documentary 'War on Internet Demons' praising Yang Yongxin.

description.zh-cn: 一款大型多人在线角色扮演游戏。在央视节目《战网魔》中被描述为血腥暴力的游戏，并与网瘾问题紧密联系。
description.en: A massively multiplayer online role-playing game. It was depicted as a bloody and violent game and closely linked to internet addiction in the CCTV program 'War on Internet Demons'.

description.zh-cn: 中国国务院对于高层次专业技术人才和高技能人才的一种奖励制度。杨永信于2009年2月成为享受该津贴的专家。
description.en: An award system by the State Council of China for high-level professional and technical talents. Yang Yongxin became an expert enjoying this allowance in February 2009.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性综合性报纸。该报于2009年5月对杨永信及其治疗中心进行了深入的调查报道，引发了广泛的社会争议。
description.en: A national comprehensive newspaper in China. In May 2009, it published an in-depth investigative report on Yang Yongxin and his treatment center, sparking widespread public controversy.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国卫生部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国卫生部
en: Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主管卫生工作的部门，于2009年7月发文叫停将电刺激（或电休克）疗法用于“网瘾”治疗。
description.en: The department in charge of health work in the People's Republic of China, which issued a notice in July 2009 to stop the use of electrostimulation (or electroconvulsive) therapy for 'internet addiction' treatment.

nodes.id: 电击法治疗网络成瘾症

zh-cn: 电击法治疗网络成瘾症
en: Electroconvulsive therapy for internet addiction disorder

description.zh-cn: 一种备受争议的治疗方法，通过电刺激对患者施加惩罚，以建立厌恶条件反射。杨永信曾广泛使用此方法治疗“网瘾”，后被中国卫生部叫停。
description.en: A controversial treatment method that uses electrical stimulation as a punishment to create an aversion conditioning. It was widely used by Yang Yongxin to treat 'internet addiction' before being banned by the Chinese Ministry of Health.

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台的深度调查报道栏目。该栏目在2009年8月播出《网瘾之戒》，对杨永信的治疗方法和设备提出质疑。
description.en: An in-depth investigative journalism program by CCTV. In August 2009, it aired 'The Abstinence of Internet Addiction', which questioned Yang Yongxin's treatment methods and equipment.

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台的财经深度报道栏目。该栏目曾报道杨永信网戒中心的收入情况，指出其敛财问题。
description.en: An in-depth financial news program by CCTV. The program reported on the income of Yang Yongxin's treatment center, pointing out the issue of wealth accumulation.

description.zh-cn: 该医院于2008年11月制定了《网络成瘾临床诊断标准》。
description.en: This hospital formulated the 'Clinical Diagnostic Criteria for Internet Addiction' in November 2008.

en: Clinical Diagnostic Criteria for Internet Addiction

description.zh-cn: 由北京军区总医院于2008年11月制定的用于诊断网络成瘾的标准，杨永信对此持反对态度。
description.en: A set of criteria for diagnosing internet addiction formulated by the Beijing Military Region General Hospital in November 2008, which Yang Yongxin opposed.

description.zh-cn: 中国社会活动家，以反对网络游戏和帮助青少年戒除网瘾而知名。曾与杨永信一同反对《网络成瘾临床诊断标准》。
description.en: A Chinese social activist known for his opposition to online games and efforts to help teenagers quit internet addiction. He once joined Yang Yongxin in opposing the 'Clinical Diagnostic Criteria for Internet Addiction'.

description.zh-cn: 《21世纪经济报道》记者，曾对杨永信的治疗方式进行报道并得出结论，认为其本质是摧毁孩子的抵抗心和自信心。
description.en: A journalist for 21st Century Business Herald who reported on Yang Yongxin's treatment methods and concluded that its essence was to destroy a child's resistance and self-confidence.

description.zh-cn: 中国广州市的官方报纸。该报曾刊文质疑杨永信是在戒除“不听话”而非网瘾。
description.en: The official newspaper of Guangzhou, China. It once published an article questioning whether Yang Yongxin was treating 'disobedience' rather than internet addiction.

description.zh-cn: 世界顶级的学术期刊。该杂志在2009年6月的一篇文章中用“最臭名昭著的”（The most infamous）来形容杨永信。
description.en: A world-leading academic journal. In a June 2009 article, the magazine described Yang Yongxin as 'The most infamous'.

description.zh-cn: 中国科普作家，以学术打假闻名。他曾发文指出杨永信的电击疗法会损害患者的记忆和认知功能。
description.en: A Chinese popular science writer known for exposing academic fraud. He published an article pointing out that Yang Yongxin's electroshock therapy could damage patients' memory and cognitive functions.

description.zh-cn: 一项在中国兴起的社会运动和产业，旨在治疗被认为是过度使用互联网的青少年。杨永信是该领域中最具争议的人物之一。
description.en: A social movement and industry that emerged in China aimed at treating adolescents perceived to be overusing the internet. Yang Yongxin is one of the most controversial figures in this field.

description.zh-cn: 一部于2010年发布的中国网络动画电影。影片中出现了一个名为“杨永新”的反派角色，影射杨永信。
description.en: A Chinese animated web film released in 2010. The film features a villain named 'Yang Yongxin' (with a different character for 'xin'), alluding to Yang Yongxin.

description.zh-cn: 一款于2016年发布的独立游戏，玩家在游戏中与以杨永信为原型的“杨教授”斗智斗勇。
description.en: An independent game released in 2016 where the player battles a character named 'Professor Yang', who is based on Yang Yongxin.

description.zh-cn: 一款多人恐怖游戏。游戏中一个擅长使用电击的杀手角色“医生”被认为影射了杨永信。
description.en: A multiplayer horror game. A killer character in the game, 'The Doctor', who specializes in using electroshock attacks, is considered to be an allusion to Yang Yongxin.

description.zh-cn: 一部于2023年发布的现实题材互动影像作品，其中名为“杨永恩”的角色以杨永信为原型。
description.en: A reality-based interactive film released in 2023, which features a character named 'Yang Yong'en' based on Yang Yongxin.

description.zh-cn: 杨永信是临沂市第四人民医院的副院长，并在该院工作超过30年。
description.en: Yang Yongxin was the vice president of Linyi Fourth People's Hospital and worked there for over 30 years.

relationships.target: 杨永信网络成瘾戒治中心

description.zh-cn: 自2008年3月起，杨永信担任其创办的杨永信网络成瘾戒治中心的主任。
description.en: Since March 2008, Yang Yongxin has served as the director of the Yang Yongxin Internet Addiction Treatment Center, which he founded.

relationships.target: 杨永信网络成瘾戒治中心

description.zh-cn: 2006年初，杨永信在临沂市第四人民医院创立了网络成瘾戒治中心并开始治疗工作。
description.en: In early 2006, Yang Yongxin founded the Internet Addiction Treatment Center at Linyi Fourth People's Hospital and began his treatment work.

relationships.source: 杨永信网络成瘾戒治中心

description.zh-cn: 杨永信网络成瘾戒治中心设立于临沂市第四人民医院内。
description.en: The Yang Yongxin Internet Addiction Treatment Center was established within the Linyi Fourth People's Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 杨永信是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Yang Yongxin is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 山东省沂水医学专科学校

description.zh-cn: 1982年7月，杨永信毕业于山东省沂水医学专科学校临床医学专业。
description.en: In July 1982, Yang Yongxin graduated from Shandong Yishui Medical College with a major in clinical medicine.

description.zh-cn: 杨永信后获得济宁医学院本科学历及学士学位。
description.en: Yang Yongxin later obtained a bachelor's degree from Jining Medical University.

description.zh-cn: 杨永信出生于山东省临沂市。
description.en: Yang Yongxin was born in Linyi, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 2008年2月，山东省卫生厅授予杨永信首届“感动山东健康卫士”称号并记其二等功。
description.en: In February 2008, the Shandong Provincial Health Department awarded Yang Yongxin the title of 'Touching Shandong Health Guardian' and a second-class merit.

description.zh-cn: 2009年2月，杨永信成为享受国务院政府特殊津贴的专家。
description.en: In February 2009, Yang Yongxin became an expert who enjoys the State Council Special Allowance.

relationships.source: 中国中央电视台社会与法频道

description.zh-cn: 该频道《第一线》栏目于2008年7月2日播出《战网魔》，以赞扬的口吻报道杨永信，使其声名大噪。
description.en: On July 2, 2008, the channel's program 'The Front Line' aired 'War on Internet Demons', which reported on Yang Yongxin in a laudatory tone, making him famous.

relationships.source: 中国中央电视台社会与法频道

description.zh-cn: 在节目《战网魔》中，将《魔兽世界》描述为血腥暴力游戏，并刻意突出其与网瘾的联系。
description.en: In the program 'War on Internet Demons', 'World of Warcraft' was depicted as a bloody and violent game, and its connection to internet addiction was deliberately emphasized.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国卫生部
relationships.target: 电击法治疗网络成瘾症

description.zh-cn: 2009年7月13日，卫生部发文，因安全性、有效性尚不确切，叫停将电刺激（或电休克）治疗用于“网瘾”的临床应用。
description.en: On July 13, 2009, the Ministry of Health issued a notice to halt the clinical application of electrostimulation (or electroconvulsive) therapy for 'internet addiction' due to uncertain safety and efficacy.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国卫生部

description.zh-cn: 卫生部叫停电击疗法，直接禁止了杨永信网戒中心的核心治疗手段，对其运作造成重大打击。
description.en: The Ministry of Health's ban on electroshock therapy directly prohibited the core treatment method of Yang Yongxin's center, dealing a significant blow to his operations.

description.zh-cn: 该报于2009年5月7日用整版篇幅刊登了对杨永信及其治疗中心的调查，引发了对其治疗方式的广泛争议。
description.en: On May 7, 2009, the newspaper dedicated a full page to an investigation of Yang Yongxin and his treatment center, sparking widespread controversy over his methods.

description.zh-cn: 该节目于2009年8月15日播出《网瘾之戒》，报道了杨永信使用被禁止生产的设备，并暗示其强迫患者说谎，将反杨声音推向高潮。
description.en: On August 15, 2009, the program aired 'The Abstinence of Internet Addiction', reporting that Yang Yongxin used banned equipment and implying he coerced patients to lie, pushing the opposition against him to a new height.

description.zh-cn: 该节目报道了杨永信网戒中心收入高达8100万元人民币，对其敛财行为提出质疑。
description.en: The program reported that Yang Yongxin's treatment center had revenues as high as 81 million RMB, questioning his profit-making activities.

description.zh-cn: 该杂志在2009年6月26日刊登文章，用“最臭名昭著的”（The most infamous）来形容杨永信，并报道了其治疗案例。
description.en: On June 26, 2009, the journal published an article describing Yang Yongxin as 'The most infamous' and reported on his treatment cases.

description.zh-cn: 方舟子发文指出，杨永信使用的电击疗法损害记忆和认知功能，并非国际医学界的推荐方法。
description.en: Fang Zhouzi published an article stating that the electroshock therapy used by Yang Yongxin damages memory and cognitive functions and is not a recommended method by the international medical community.

description.zh-cn: 记者郭建龙在报道后得出结论，认为杨永信的治疗方法“其实就是摧毁孩子的抵抗心和自信心，让其产生恐惧感，然后暂时屈服”。
description.en: Journalist Guo Jianlong concluded after his reporting that Yang Yongxin's method 'is actually about destroying the child's resistance and self-confidence, making them feel fear, and then temporarily submit'.

description.zh-cn: 该报于2009年5月刊文《比网瘾更可怕的是什么》，质疑杨永信的治疗目的并非戒网瘾，而是戒除“不听话”。
description.en: In May 2009, the newspaper published an article titled 'What's Scarier Than Internet Addiction', questioning whether Yang Yongxin's goal was to treat 'disobedience' rather than internet addiction.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国“全国戒网瘾专家”，杨永信的理论和实践在中国的戒网瘾运动中产生了巨大影响。
description.en: As China's 'national expert on quitting internet addiction', Yang Yongxin's theories and practices have had a huge impact on the internet addiction treatment movement in China.

relationships.target: 电击法治疗网络成瘾症

description.zh-cn: 杨永信是使用电击法治疗网络成瘾症最知名的实践者和推广者，他将其称为“醒脑治疗”。
description.en: Yang Yongxin was the most well-known practitioner and promoter of using electroconvulsive therapy for internet addiction, which he called 'brain-awakening therapy'.

description.zh-cn: 2008年11月，北京军区总医院制定了《网络成瘾临床诊断标准》。
description.en: In November 2008, the Beijing Military Region General Hospital formulated the 'Clinical Diagnostic Criteria for Internet Addiction'.

description.zh-cn: 杨永信对北京军区总医院制定的《网络成瘾临床诊断标准》持反对态度，认为其不够科学准确。
description.en: Yang Yongxin opposed the 'Clinical Diagnostic Criteria for Internet Addiction' formulated by the Beijing Military Region General Hospital, believing it was not scientific or accurate enough.

description.zh-cn: 陶宏开与杨永信一同对《网络成瘾临床诊断标准》持反对态度。
description.en: Tao Hongkai, along with Yang Yongxin, opposed the 'Clinical Diagnostic Criteria for Internet Addiction'.

description.zh-cn: 这部网络影片中的反派角色“杨永新”影射了杨永信，对其形象进行了负面描绘和讽刺。
description.en: The villain 'Yang Yongxin' (with a different character for 'xin') in this web film alludes to Yang Yongxin, portraying his image negatively and satirically.

description.zh-cn: 这款独立游戏中以杨永信为原型的角色“杨教授”作为反派出现，批判其治疗方法。
description.en: In this independent game, the character 'Professor Yang', based on Yang Yongxin, appears as an antagonist, criticizing his treatment methods.

description.zh-cn: 该游戏推出的一个擅长电击的杀手角色“医生”，被广泛认为是影射杨永信及其治疗手段。
description.en: A killer character named 'The Doctor' who specializes in electroshock attacks, introduced in this game, is widely considered to be an allusion to Yang Yongxin and his treatment methods.

description.zh-cn: 这部互动影像作品中的角色“杨永恩”以杨永信为原型，对其行为进行了批判性的展现。
description.en: The character 'Yang Yong'en' in this interactive film is based on Yang Yongxin, presenting a critical depiction of his actions.
